Name: Black metal
Source: Refined in a Blast furnace from Black metal scrap

Name: Black metal scrap
Source: Dropped by Fulings, Fuling Berserkers, and Fuling shamans

Name: Bronze
Source: Crafted at a Forge by combining two Copper with one Tin

Name: Copper
Source: Refined in a Smelter from Copper ore

Name: Copper ore
Source: Mined from copper veins in the Black Forest

Name: Iron
Source: Refined in a Smelter from Scrap iron
Looted from chests

Name: Scrap iron
Source: Mined from Muddy scrap piles in the Swamp
Looted from chests in Sunken Crypts

Name: Silver
Source: Refined in a Smelter from Silver ore

Name: Silver ore
Source: Mined from veins in the Mountains located with the Wishbone

Name: Tin
Source: Refined in a Smelter from Tin ore

Name: Tin ore
Source: Mined from Tin deposits found near bodies of water in the Black Forest

Name: Ancient bark
Source: Ancient Trees in the Swamp

Name: Core wood
Source: Pine in the Black Forest

Name: Fine wood
Source: Birch and Oak trees

Name: Wood
Source: All Trees
Branches on ground
Greydwarfs

Name: Blueberries
Source: Bushes in the Black Forest

Name: Blood pudding
Source: Crafted from Thistle, Barley flour, and Bloodbag at a Cauldron

Name: Bread
Source: Crafted from Barley flour at a Cauldron

Name: Carrot
Source: Grown from planting Carrot seeds using the Cultivator tool

Name: Carrot soup
Source: Crafted from Carrot and Mushroom at a Cauldron

Name: Cloudberries
Source: Bushes in the Plains

Name: Cooked fish
Source: Use Raw fish on a Cooking station

Source: Use Lox meat on a Cooking station

Source: Use Raw meat on a Cooking station

Source: Use Serpent meat on a Cooking station

Source: Use Neck tail on a Cooking station

Source: On the ground in the Meadows and Black Forest

Name: Neck tail
Source: Dropped by Necks

Source: On bushes in the Meadows

Name: Raw fish
Source: From Fish in most bodies of water, either caught barehanded or with the Fishing rod

Name: Raw meat
Source: Dropped by Deer and Boars
